intro: Pilosella norrliniiformis, commonly known as the slender pilosella, is a flowering plant belonging to the Asteraceae family. It is characterized by its small, white to pale yellow flowers that are typically clustered in dense, spherical inflorescences. The plant has hairy stems and leaves, which are often covered in fine, short pubescence. It is native to mountainous regions of Europe and is often found in alpine meadows and rocky soils. Pilosella norrliniiformis is an herbaceous perennial that thrives in cool, moist environments.
